author: James Anaston-Karas
text:
For city clients, looking to find a municipality, county, or other public entity which has either built or operates through management agreement (or other?) a mechanical lift which moves boats into various fresh or saltwater water bodies.   Looking to learn from your experience. Photos, plans, description, budget, etc. would be great!  
Please contact Jim Anaston-Karas in Florida at jeakaras@gmail.com   772.341.0524
title: Do you operate a public boat lift?
